title: 3DTILES_content_gltf extension
description: 3D Tiles extension that allows a tileset to use glTF 2.0 and GLB models directly as tile content.

extensionsUsed.description: An array of glTF extensions used by glTF content in the tileset.

extensionsRequired.description: An array of glTF extensions required by glTF content in the tileset.
